scripts.build:dev: rimraf dist && webpack --env dev --config webpack.build-resources.config.js && pnpm build:preprocessor && webpack --env dev --config webpack.package-resources.config.js
scripts.build:prod: pnpm lint && pnpm test && rimraf dist && webpack --config webpack.build-resources.config.js && pnpm build:preprocessor && webpack --config webpack.package-resources.config.js && pnpm test:it
scripts.cy:run:darwin:linux: pnpm cypress run -b chrome --project it-tests --config "baseUrl=http://localhost:$(build-env standaloneEditors.dev.port)"
scripts.cy:run:win32: yarn powershell pnpm cypress run -b chrome --project it-tests --config "baseUrl=http://localhost:$(build-env standaloneEditors.dev.port)"
scripts.cy:open:win32: yarn powershell pnpm cypress open --project it-tests --config "baseUrl=http://localhost:$(build-env standaloneEditors.dev.port)"
scripts.test:it: pnpm run-script-if --bool "$(build-env global.build.testIT)" --then "pnpm rimraf ./dist-it-tests" "pnpm start-server-and-test start:it http-get://0.0.0.0:$(build-env standaloneEditors.dev.port) cy:run"
